阜偏: (こざとへん) - (e.g. left side of 防)  kanji "mound" or "small village" radical at left (radical 170)
阪神: (hanshin) - Osaka-Kobe; Hanshin (nome da empresa: ferrovia, loja de departamentos, time de beisebol, etc.)
阪神大震災: (はんしんだいしんさい) - Great Hanshin Earthquake (Jan 1995)
阮咸: (げんかん) - ruanxian (4 or 5-stringed Chinese lute); ruan
防ぐ: (fusegu) - defender-se contra, proteger-se contra; prevenir, evitar
防しわ加工: (ぼうしわかこう) - crease proofing; crease resistant finish
防じん: (ぼうじん) - protection against dust; dust-proof/dust-tight
防カビ: (ぼうカビ) - mold prevention; mildew prevention
防カビ剤: (ぼうカビざい) - anti-mold agent; mildew-proofing agent
防人: (ぼうじん) - soldiers garrisoned at strategic posts in Kyushu in ancient times; (ぼうじん only) Chinese soldiers stationed to protect remote regions of the country during the T'ang dynasty
防具: (ぼうぐ) - guard; protector; defensive armament; personal armor (armour)
防塵: (ぼうじん) - protection against dust; dust-proof/dust-tight
防塵服: (ぼうじんふく) - dust-preventive clothing; dust-free workwear; dustproof workwear
防塵着: (ぼうじんぎ) - dustproof clothing one would use in a cleanroom
防寒具: (ぼうかんぐ) - heavy outfit designed to keep out the cold
防已: (ツヅラフジ) - Chinese moonseed (Sinomenium acutum); complex inter-relationship (as in the struggle between two types of vine over one piece of land)
防弾チョッキ: (ぼうだんチョッキ) - bulletproof vest
防御率: (ぼうぎょりつ) - earned run average; ERA
防止策: (ぼうしさく) - prevention measure; preventive measures
防水シート: (ぼうすいシート) - waterproof sheet; tarpaulin; tarp; flysheet (of a tent)
防水長靴: (ぼうすいながぐつ) - waterproof long boots; waders
防湿: (ぼうしつ) - dampproofing; prevention of moisture
防湿剤: (ぼうしつざい) - dessicant; dessicating agent
防滴: (ぼうてき) - rainproof; treated against drops of water penetrating
防潜網: (ぼうせんもう) - an anti-submarine net
防潮: (ぼうちょう) - protection against the tide
防潮堤: (ぼうちょうてい) - tide embankment; seawall
防火: (ぼうか) - fire prevention; fire fighting; fire proof
防火建築: (ぼうかけんちく) - a fireproof building
防火用水: (ぼうかようすい) - water for fighting fires
防災の日: (ぼうさいのひ) - Disaster Preparedness Day (September 1st)
防災無線: (ぼうさいむせん) - wireless-activated disaster warning system
防災訓練: (ぼうさいくんれん) - disaster prevention practice
防災週間: (ぼうさいしゅうかん) - Disaster Preparedness Week
防災頭巾: (ぼうさいずきん) - disaster hood; protective hood worn during earthquakes and other disasters (e.g. to protect from falling objects)
防煙: (ぼうえん) - protection from smoke; anti-smoke
防犯装備: (ぼうはんそうび) - security equipment (pepper spray, taser, batons, etc.); anti-theft device
防疫: (ぼうえき) - communicable disease control (e.g. by quarantine, disinfection, etc.); prevention of epidemics
防皺加工: (ぼうしわかこう) - crease proofing; crease resistant finish
防砂林: (ぼうさりん) - stand of trees planted to control the movement of sand
防禦: (ぼうぎょ) - defense; defence; safeguard; protection
